text: The Caveman is a 1926 American silent comedy movie directed by Lewis Milestone and was based on the play of the same name by Gelett Burgess. It stars Matt Moore, Marie Prevost, Myrna Loy, Phyllis Haver, Virginia Fox, Hedda Hooper and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * Category:1926 comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone
title: The Caveman (1926 movie)
